history.content:
Free Ventures is recruiting for our internal team! Free Ventures is UC Berkeley's leading pre-seed startup accelerator, crafting highly individualized paths for founders across industries and academic backgrounds in a 3-month program 🚀

 

As the university's only nonprofit incubator program run by students, internal team members receive an unparalleled exposure to Berkeley's leading startups through the process of selecting founders, operating the accelerator, and managing portfolio companies and partner relations. We spend our full time helping our companies with product, fundraising, marketing, and more while curating a support network of top venture capitalists, resource partners, founders, and thought leaders from the Valley. 

 

In doing so, we have helped our 57 alumni teams — ranging from undergrads to MBAs and PhDs — raise over $40 million from top firms such as Y Combinator, Greylock, Kleiner Perkins, and Accel. Collectively they’ve gone on to tackle problems in Neuroscience, Drones, IoT, VR, AI/ML, Blockchain, Bioengineering, FinTech, and Renewable Energy, to name a few.

 

If you're interested in empowering talented Berkeley students to keep building and creating, we'd love to meet! Come out to our infosession on Tuesday, March 6th (FB event: bit.ly/freevinfo) and apply at http://www.freeventures.org/apply/ by midnight Friday, 3/6.
history.subject: Free Ventures Internal Team is Recruiting!
